summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ContentAI full-stack application. Backend APIs working excellently (94.1% success rate). Frontend loads correctly with vibrant gradient design, authentication flows work, text/image generation functional. Minor overlay issue from webpack dev server ESLint warnings fixed.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - error handling works but status code inconsistent

ui_bugs.issue: ESLint warning overlay occasionally blocks interactions

passed_tests: Landing page loads with vibrant gradient design
User signup flow creates account successfully
User login flow works with valid credentials
Dashboard loads after authentication with sidebar navigation
Text generation works for blog/article/social media styles using GPT-5.2
Image generation works using OpenAI GPT Image 1 (30-60 second generation time)
Copy text to clipboard functionality works
Download text as TXT/PDF functionality works
History page loads and displays generated content
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
All backend API endpoints return correct responses
